channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Shanghai Key Lab of Intell. Info. Processing, School of CS, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: OmniTokenizer: A Joint Image-Video Tokenizer for Visual Generation
item.description: OmniTokenizer: A transformer-based tokenizer achieving state-of-the-art image and video reconstruction by leveraging a novel spatial-temporal decoupled architecture and progressive training strategy.

item.title: UnSeg: One Universal Unlearnable Example Generator is Enough against All Image Segmentation
item.description: UnSeg: One universal unlearnable example generator protects images from image segmentation model training.
